success_question: How will your trip make an impact ?
success_percent: Approx. 80% of the sale value stays in the local area.
success_local_economy: You help establish tourism as a livelihood for vulnerable communities.
success_local_conservation: You encourage the conservation of natural ecosystems that nature tourism depends on.
success_local_traditions: You promote cultural exchange and help preserve centuries-old traditions.
success_contribute: You contribute to communities taking ownership of their territory and fostering a deeper connection with nature.
